body_html: @omalleyt12 Thank you for your response. Actually, I have many such "mask" variables in my network, which are online calculated; these cannot be known before nor passed as inputs. Could there be any way of doing this? Thank you.

body: @omalleyt12 Thank you for your response. Actually, I have many such "mask" variables in my network, which are online calculated; these cannot be known before nor passed as inputs. Could there be any way of doing this? Thank you.
